desc.p: This field contains the label defining parameter 3 of the specific exclusion rule.
Format - C (35)
This field contains the user exit routine. This routine will be called while doing the Exclusion preparation by the system or will be called by the Month end EOD.
Based on the return value the respective Portfolio will be excluded for the Exclusion code.
The five parameters for the User exit routine are:
1. Portfolio ID - Input parameter.
2. Value1 - Input parameter from the field Sp.Excl.P1.V in Am.Composite record.
3. Value2 - Input parameter from the field Sp.Excl.P2.V in Am.Composite record.
4. Value3 - Input parameter from the field Sp.Excl.P3.V in Am.Composite record.
5. Return Flag - Output parameter ( Only Y/N).
Should be valid PGM.FILE with file type as "S".
This field contains the label defining parameter 2 of the specific exclusion rule.
Format - C (35)
This field contains the code for the specific exclusion rule.
Format - N (3)
This field contains the label defining the specific exclusion rule.
Format - C (35)
This field contains a detailed description of the specific exclusion rule.
Format - C (35)
This field contains the label defining parameter 1 of the specific exclusion rule.
Format - C (35)
